category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE

preference.name: CAE_apply_reuse_rules_to_sub_assemblies
preference.preference_description: Applies CAE Structure Map Reuse Rules to product sub-assemblies. The Valid Values: * true: this is the default value * false: the Reuse Rules will not be applied to product sub-assemblies
